title: Sisweb, the student information system on the web
body:
Student Information System (SISWEB)




Login to Schedule BuilderNew!





Registered students
You can use SISWEB to enroll in classes, adjust your class schedule, view and print your class schedule, print your unofficial academic 	record, change your address, view your account, view your financial aid status, and much more.
Prospective Undergraduates
Check SISWEB for your application status using your Prospective Student UC Davis ID.
Prospective Graduates
You can apply for Graduate Studies or check the status of your application.


Related Links

Office of the University Registrar
Graduate Studies
Undergraduate Admissions
Graduate Admissions
Financial Aid
UC Davis Home




Register for classes using the new Schedule Builder tool!
Schedule Builder is a new class planning and registration tool available in beta version, which you can use instead of SISWeb for spring quarter. It allows you to search for classes and register in one place. It’s also mobile friendly, so you can use it from a Web-enabled smartphone or tablet.The Office of the University Registrar wants to ensure that Schedule Builder meets your needs; we encourage you to try it, then tell us about your experience by using the “Feedback” button. After you use Schedule Builder, you will be able to view your class schedule in SISWeb as well. And if you’d prefer to register for classes the old way, you can still access SISWeb. SISWeb also remains available for other tasks, such as updating your address and phone number.
                Try it today!



Search and register for classes
Create and save multiple schedules for the same quarter prior to your registration period
Check for registration holds and errors prior to your registration period  
Register for one class at a time or for all classes at once
Beginning with Pass 2 registration, choose if you’d like to be added to the waitlist for classes that are full
View your schedule in both list and calendar formats
Change classes and sections without losing your existing registration
View class details and critical class messages






Quick Reminders

                To access the SISWEB system you will need your UC Davis LoginID and corresponding password. Information on the campus computing account is available from Information and Educational Technology, which manages the accounts.

The SISWEB system is normally available 24 hours a day, except from midnight Friday through 10 a.m. Saturday.
PLEASE REMEMBER, if you are using a public terminal, to exit/quit the browser when your are finished. This will help protect the security of your personal information.  Do not use the forward/back buttons on your browser unless specifically directed to.



Need Help?
